testcase.classname: User could register a new account
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test11@example.com" field and fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" and "P@ssw0rd".passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" email: "test11@example.com" and password: "P@ssw0rd".passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user is logged to the system successfully..............................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" email: "wrong@example.com" and password: "P@ssw0rd".passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Currencies | users could select Euro currency from the dropdown list on the home page
testcase.name: user could select Euro currency from home page
testcase.system-out: Given user open the currency drop down at home page and select Euro option..passed Then Euro symbol is displayed on all products...............................passed

testcase.classname: F05_HoverCategories | Verify that user can select sub-category when hover on its main category
testcase.name: User can hover on one of main categories then click on sub category
testcase.system-out: Given user hovers on a main-category........................................passed When the sub category list open and the user can click on any sub-category..passed Then sub-category page will open successfully...............................passed
